confirmation.detail: The move for {{person.fullname}} has been added to allocation for {{moves_count}} {{people}} from {{from_location}} to {{to_location}} on {{date}}

no_special_vehicle.page_title: You can’t add this person to an allocation
no_special_vehicle.heading: You can’t add this person to an allocation
no_special_vehicle.content:
As this person needs a special vehicle they cannot be part of this allocation.

If you would still like to move this person you can create a single request for them to move to another prison.

unassign.detail: Remove {{person.fullname}} from the allocation for {{moves_count}} {{people}} from {{from_location}} to {{to_location}} on {{date}}
